segments.text: Ok, I'm makin' a break for it, I'm goin' out the window.
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: No, no, no, don't! I've been waitin' for like, forever to go out with Lorraine. Just calm down.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: Calm down? Calm down? You set me up with the woman that I've dumped twice in the last five months!
segments.speaker: Chandler

segments.text: Can you stop yellin'? You're makin' me nervous, and I can't go when I'm nervous.
segments.speaker: Joey

segments.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, you're right.  Come on, do it, do it, go, come on!!!
segments.speaker: Chandler
